sentences.en: A freighter slipped by, heading seaward.
sentences.cn: 一艘货船朝着海洋方向驶去.

sentences.en: As they were crawling southward they spotted a small freighter.
sentences.cn: 他们正向南徐徐航行时,发现了一条小货船.

sentences.en: The artificial reef, the Triangle, was put together from a freighter, a barge and -- this is the Palm Beach area, after all -- an old Rolls Royce.
sentences.cn: 人工鱼礁、百慕大三角通过货船和驳船装运相连在一起，中间的区域便是棕榈滩。 这卡片终究堪比“一辆古老的劳斯莱斯”。

sentences.en: The damaged freighter was taken in tow.
sentences.cn: 那损坏的货轮被拖着走.

sentences.en: The freighter carries a few passengers in addition to its cargo.
sentences.cn: 这艘货船除了货物之外还载有一些乘客.

sentences.en: The freighter carrying pig iron is cleaving through the water.
sentences.cn: 装着生铁的货船正在破浪前进.

sentences.en: The freighter fouled its propeller in fishing nets.
sentences.cn: 货船的螺旋桨被渔网缠住了。

sentences.en: The freighter rounded the Cape of Good Hope and sailed into the Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 货轮绕过好望角,驶入大西洋.

sentences.en: The freighter steered out of Santiago Bay that evening.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上货轮驶出了圣地亚哥湾.

sentences.en: The freighter was fuming thick black smoke and ready for departure.
sentences.cn: 货轮冒出浓烟正准备出航.

sentences.en: The freighter was launched into water with a great splash.
sentences.cn: 货船入水时溅起巨大的水花.

sentences.en: The ocean - going freighter cleared Dalian harbour yesterday.
sentences.cn: 远洋货轮昨天结关后离开大连港.

sentences.en: This freighter can sail for 15 days without docking.
sentences.cn: 这艘货轮能够不停靠码头连续航行十五天.

sentences.en: This new freighter is near completion.
Twenty minutes later he was on an Italian freighter slated for Sicily.
sentences.cn: 二十分钟之后,他登上了一艘开往西西里的意大利货轮.

sentences.en: Valuable raw materials were salvaged ( from the sunken freighter ).
sentences.cn: ( 从沉船中 ) 打捞起许多贵重的原料.

trans.tran_cn: 货船，租船人，装货人，货主，承运人
trans.tran_en: a ship or aircraft that carries goods
